sentences.en: I had assumed him to be a Belgian.
sentences.cn: 我本以为他是比利时人。

sentences.en: The Belgian actor Jean Claude Van Damme has been dubbed 'Muscles from Brussels'.
sentences.cn: 比利时演员让•克劳德•范•达默被戏称为“布鲁塞尔的肌肉”。

sentences.en: Upon a negative decision, the applicant loses the protection offered by Belgian law.
sentences.cn: 一旦得到否定裁决，申请人就失去了比利时法律所给予的保护。
